name: Ostrich game runner
description:
Ostrich game adventure

Exciting game for children and adults about Ostrich. 30 difficulty levels. Exciting missions. It is necessary to collect objects and overcome obstacles. Original graphics and an interesting step-by-step guide. To jump, use the yellow button with the up arrow. The ostrich must jump through a fantastic transport (carts of different configurations), through spiders, through cacti and other obstacles.
